entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is trying to learn Occlumency and has exams coming up.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend who is concerned about his ability to block his mind.

relationships.description: Hermione is concerned about Harry's ability to block his mind, as evidenced by her question 'You are trying to block your mind, aren't you?'
Harry's part of his mind often speaks in Hermione's voice, indicating that he is influenced by her.
